TopicTitle: I think this is the right place for this

Articles.Content: i have an HP 2000 and its got decent speeds and such the only thing slowing it down is the ram which is 4gb how could i expand it without needing to replace the bottom cover of my laptop?

To better help you, A specific model number of the laptop would be nice.

Why not take this over to the KSP Computer Building Megathread?
